notes.general: This design incorporates Art Deco influences along with luxury and comfort features suitable for a bachelor pad, while adhering to local building norms and Vastu guidelines. The plot dimension of 30x40 feet has been considered for optimal spatial planning including a large garden area integrated into the layout.

garden.description: A generous garden space is included surrounding the cottage with landscaping elements that complement the Art Deco design, offering privacy and aesthetic appeal.
